Segment.name: Q8
Segment.comment: To transmit detailed lading data, damage, and disposition information

Field.name: LadingExceptionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the condition of the shipment

Field.name: PackagingFormCode
Field.comment: Code for packaging form of the lading quantity

Field.name: LadingQuantity
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: LadingDescription
Field.comment: Description of an item as required for rating and billing purposes

Field.name: DamageReasonCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the specific reason for exception condition

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
